Posts.Title: Arinidex - any difference with side effects if taken in morning or before bed?

Posts.Content: sorryphone froze upanyway t ake the aspring  fourty five miinutes before u take ur ai and for me it has made my hot flashes from hell where during a blizzrd i was outside in shorts to pretty mellow i still have them but no longer dip in sweatas for jointpain again talk to ur onc i take vit d at high dosages and clartain yeap the allery med is proven to help with pain  i  also do water aerobic and that helps sooo much
Posts.Title: Arinidex - any difference with side effects if taken in morning or before bed?

Posts.Content: I take my femara at night before bed so i can sleep  through any side effects   but I hav enot had an issue with it upsetting my tummy  the other side effect you will get has nothing to do with time of day u take it hot flashes joint pain etc you learn to live with them it si=ucks!

Posts.Title: Nutritional suggestions ?

Posts.Content: This is very common  when given taxol or taxoterre  with time some goes away but not all of it vit b 6 helps but you soon learn to live with it mine is mostly in my feet  and toes my fingers slowly got better drink a ton of water to help flush but it  has been 2 years since my last treatment. slowly it gets better
